ch.dermitza.securenio

Class ChangeRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.dermitza.securenio.ChangeRequest

  • public final class ChangeRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    A ChangeRequest defines a request for some operation that needs to be executed on the selector thread. ChangeRequests are created and queued from threads that interact with the selector thread and are necessary as the result of some particular operation being completed (e.g. an SSLEngineTask having finished).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int TYPE_OPS
      This type concerns switching the interestOps of a key associated with a particular socket.
      static int TYPE_SESSION
      This type concerns an SSLSession that has been invalidated.
      static int TYPE_TASK
      This type concerns an SSLEngine task that has just finished running on the TaskWorker thread.
      static int TYPE_TIMEOUT
      This type concerns a timeout that has expired on the given socket.

    • Field Detail

      • TYPE_TASK

        public static final int TYPE_TASK
        This type concerns an SSLEngine task that has just finished running on the TaskWorker thread.

        This type of task is used if and only if the SecureSocket is processing tasks via the TaskWorker thread (multi-threaded implementation).

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TYPE_OPS

        public static final int TYPE_OPS
        This type concerns switching the interestOps of a key associated with a particular socket.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TYPE_TIMEOUT

        public static final int TYPE_TIMEOUT
        This type concerns a timeout that has expired on the given socket. As such, the socket needs to be closed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TYPE_SESSION

        public static final int TYPE_SESSION
        This type concerns an SSLSession that has been invalidated. As such, we need to re-initiate handshaking.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChangeRequest

        public ChangeRequest(SocketIF sc,
             int type,
             int interestOps)
        A ChangeRequest defines a request for some operation that needs to be executed on the selector thread. ChangeRequests are created and queued from threads that interact with the selector thread and are necessary as the result of some particular operation being completed (e.g. an SSLEngine task having finished).
        Parameters:
        sc - The SocketIF associated with this ChangeRequest
        type - The type associated with this ChangeRequest
        interestOps - The interestOps (SelectionKey.interestOps) associated with this ChangeRequest. If the type of this ChangeRequest is anything other than TYPE_OPS, the interestOps can be set to anything safely.

    • Method Detail

      • getChannel

        public SocketIF getChannel()
        Get the SocketIF associated with this ChangeRequest
        Returns:
        The SocketIF associated with this ChangeRequest

      • getType

        public int getType()
        Get the type associated with this ChangeRequest
        Returns:
        The type associated with this ChangeRequest

      • getOps

        public int getOps()
        Get the interestOps associated with this ChangeRequest
        Returns:
        The interestOps associated with this ChangeRequest. Return of this method is unspecified for ChangeRequests with types other than TYPE_OPS.
